characters.jack: Jack is a young traveler with short, slightly messy brown hair and bright green eyes. He wears a beige short-sleeved button-up shirt with brown buttons, khaki cargo shorts, and sturdy brown hiking boots. He carries a medium-sized blue backpack with a single strap over one shoulder. His wide-brimmed sunhat is slightly oversized, often tilting awkwardly on his head.
characters.taxi_driver: A middle-aged Egyptian man with short black hair, a mustache, and deep brown eyes. He wears a loose-fitting white short-sleeved shirt with a few buttons undone at the top, dark gray pants, and black sandals. He has a friendly, amused expression most of the time.

places.cairo_airport: A bustling airport exterior with taxis and travelers. The background features modern airport signage, palm trees, and a warm, golden sky. The pavement is well-maintained, with clear lane markings for taxis and buses. No texts are visible.
places.cairo_street: A chaotic urban street filled with honking cars, yellow taxis, motorcycles, and donkey carts. Buildings in the background are a mix of modern and traditional architecture, with beige and pastel-colored facades. The streets are lined with small shops.
places.pyramids_pizza: A small, vibrant pizza restaurant with a bright red sign reading 'Pyramids Pizza' in bold white letters. The front has large glass windows showing people inside enjoying pizza. The surrounding area is busy, with people walking and cars passing by.
places.pyramids_mall: A large, modern shopping mall with a sleek, glass-fronted exterior. The mall entrance has a bold golden sign reading 'Pyramids Mall.' Shoppers can be seen walking in and out, and a parking lot full of cars is in the foreground.
places.giza_pyramids: The vast desert landscape of Giza, featuring the towering Great Pyramids in the background. The sand is golden and warm, with occasional camel footprints. A few scattered tourists are visible in the distance, along with a camel nearby. The sky is clear blue with a few wispy clouds.

negative_common_prompt: No futuristic elements, no anachronisms, no sunglasses, no overly modern vehicles, no incorrect signs, no nighttime scenes, no additional characters unless specified.

prompts.negative_prompt: No incorrect airport signage. No text. No airport name.

prompts.prompt: A Camel with the giza_pyramids in the background.
prompts.negative_prompt: No incorrect camel riding position, no modern distractions. No multiple camels, no multiple pyramids.

prompts.prompt: amused face of jack rolls his eyes with giza_pyramids in the background
prompts.negative_prompt: No modern ice cream carts, No multiple camels, no multiple pyramids.
